授業目的:
To enhance students' skills for conducting individual research and preparing them to write a satisfactory graduation
thesis of their choice.
到達目標:
1. To
develop students' academic interest in global migration, forced migration, contemporary political and economic affairs
related to the MENA region. 2. To prepare students to choose a
research topic for their graduation thesis. 3. To learn and apply critical and analytical research
methods.
関連科目: While it is not a prerequisite, students are encouraged to take Topics in International Politics A and Topics in International Politics B courses.
授業方法:
Lecture, group discussion, and individual
consultation.

トピック.授業外学習2: Handouts and readings will be distributed to students.

学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic: Each course is positioned within the curriculum in accordance with the diploma policy and curriculum policy established by each undergraduate/graduate school. By proceeding with the study of this course with an awareness of the DP and CP, the following abilities expected by each undergraduate/graduate school will be developed.Research Seminars:1. Understanding and analytical skills regarding international issues: the ability to understand and analyze various regions of the world from different perspectives in the humanities and social sciences.2. Problem-solving skills: the ability to proactively identify problems and solve them based on appropriate methods.3. Intercultural understanding and multicultural coexistence: the ability to be sensitive to different cultures and to coexist with diverse cultures.4. Ethical Values: Acquiring it though ‘liberal arts education for human growth’ based on Christian principles.
